=======
History
=======

0.6.0 (2016-3-15)
------------------

* move git, supervisor, slack as plugins.
* put git bare repo on path.
* add fis plugin.
* add `fap` cli.
* use signal to refactor release/rollback flow.
* add curl plugin.
* add supervisor plugin.

0.5.1 (2015-2-1)
------------------

* support supervisor group
* slack notification.

0.1.0 (2015-9-23)
------------------

* First release.
